ygData.subject: Re: On Runed Totem Staffs
ygData.msgSnippet: I personally have no idea if the skull and staff can currently be combined. I like the idea. Based on pure semantics though, calling it a runed totem staff
ygData.messageBody:
I personally have no idea if the skull and staff can currently be combined.
I like the idea.

Based on pure semantics though, calling it a runed totem staff implies there
should be a totem on it. The skull being the totem makes sense to me. Though
in that case I think it would make more sense to have the staff be called
the sacred runed staff and the staff + skull be called the runed totem
staff.

Just some musings.

Veneficus
magician (lev 17) Mythannial Marr


>
> No I have to disagree, ever seen the priest of discord
> infront of the castle
> in Rivervale. .. perfect example of how it looked. In beta you could
> combine them by clicking on the staff and then the skull and
> it was that
> easy. . .but they changed it. Also the name of the staff when it is
> combined is The Sacred Runed Staff.
>
> Demur
>
> That is a Myth. You cannot combine a Runed Totem Staff and a
> Skull. The
> skull can be placed in your 2nd hand if you are not using a
> 2h weapon. This
> will increase your mana by 20 and SV by 3 I belive..
>
> Valacian - 22nd Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>
